mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (origin_file_name, stored_file_name, resource_url, file_size) VALUES (#{originFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{resourceUrl}, #{fileSize});
mapper.select: SELECT file_id AS fileID, post_id AS postID, comment_id AS commentID, resource_url AS resourceUrl, origin_file_name AS originFileName, stored_file_name AS storedFileName, file_size AS fileSize, upload_time AS uploadTime FROM files WHERE file_id = #{fileID};
